titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1530) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1996 for military activities of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel strengths for fiscal year 1996, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-136, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1530 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Specified amendments are in order. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on National Security, as modified and amended as specified by provisions of this resolution. Only those amendments printed in the report accompanying this resolution shall be in order, to be considered as specified by provisions of this resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 56.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 183 (Roll no. 368).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/13/1995--Passed House amended. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1530 (authorizing appropriations for FY 1996 for the Department of Defense).
